questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
Check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare a Damage / Incident and Missing report.
Switch on the Equipment and confirm the Equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230V
shift the equipment to another place where the AC Voltage 230V is provided
check the power cord cable for continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether it is defective or not
the power cord cable is defective replace it with the new one
check whether the AC fuse is blown.
replace the fuse with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the 230v AC is available at the Input connector.
check for any carbon formation or breakage of the Input pin connector
replace the power input pin connector

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the input pin connector

questions.question: check and confirm whether the input voltage to transformer is available.

videos.videoName: Video for checking I/P to transformer

questions.question: check whether the fuse on DC Board is blown.
replace the fuse with a new one
check and confirm whether the output of transformer is available.

videos.videoName: Video for checking O/P of transformer

questions.question: replace the transformer with a new one
check and confirm whether the output of DC board is available.

videos.videoName: Video required for checking DC Board O/P

questions.question: repair / replace the board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the DC Board

questions.question: check for any loose connection or breakage of cable between the DC Board and control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether some of the buttons or buttons do not respond while pressing.
check the connection between the keypad and control board for any loose connection or breakage of cable.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
replace / repair the keypad accordingly
check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is blank
repair / replace the display with a new one
confirm whether the ml of syringe is detected and displayed.
kindly replace the sensor near the drive board
check and confirm whether the syringe spindle is moving freely.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether any blockage in the path of motor drive.
clean the path
replace the motor with a new one and confirm whether the problem still persist
replace the motor assembly drive with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through the video call
Thanks
